釂字的基本解释

釂
jiào
饮酒干杯：“解姊子负解之势，与人饮，使之釂，非其任，强灌之。”

釂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiào］
［《廣韻》子肖切，去笑，精。］
饮尽杯中酒。

釂字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　釂； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1289第28
【唐韻】【正韻】?子肖切，音醮。【說文】㱃酒盡也。【博雅】釂，盡也。【禮·曲禮】長者舉未釂，少者不敢飮。【註】盡爵曰釂。【前漢·游俠傳】郭解?子負解之勢，與人飮，使之釂，非其任，强灌之。【註】盡爵曰釂。其人不飮而使盡爵，乃强灌之。【張協·七命】酒駕芳軒，千鍾電釂。　又【韻補】叶卽略切，音爵。【班固·西都賦】陳輕騎以行炰，騰酒車以斟酌。割鮮野食，舉烽命釂。

考證：〔【班固·西都賦】陣輕騎以爲炰，騰酒車以斟酌。割鮮飮食，舉烽命釂。〕　謹照原文陣改陳。爲改行。飲改野。
釂字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
釂字的起名意思

暂无。

drain a goblet
Basic explanation of words
drain a goblet
jiào
Drink a toast: "Relieve your sister's negative momentum, drink with others, make it awkward, not your responsibility, force it."
drain a goblet
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiào］
["Guangyun" Zi Xiaoqie, laugh, fine. ]
Drink up a glass of wine.
drain a goblet
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　釂; Kangxi strokes: 25; Page number: page 1289 28
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Zi Xiaoqie, sound glutinous. [Said the text] 㱃 drink out. [Bo Ya] Awesome, do it all. 【Li·Chu Li】The elders don’t dare to squat, but the younger ones don’t dare to squat. [Note] Di Jue Yue said 釂. [Previous Han · Ranger Legend] Guo Jie? The son of Guo Jie lost the power of resolving, and squatted with others, making him stunned, not his responsibility, but forced to inflict him on it. [Note] Di Jue Yue said 釂. The person who does not want to use the nobility is to force it. 【Zhang Xie·Seven Lives】Drinking and driving Fangxuan, thousands of hours of electric shock.　[Rhyme Filling] Ye 卽 cut slightly, Yin Jue. [Ban Gu·Xidu Fu] Chen Qingqi used to go on the bamboo, and drove the wine cart for consideration. Chopping fresh wild food, giving up a fate. Textual research: [[Bangu·Xidufu] Zhen Qingqi thinks that it is 炰, so take the wine cart for consideration. Cut fresh food, give life and death. 〕 　 I would like to change the report according to the original text. For diverted. Change from drinking to wild.
drain a goblet

Name meaning
Nothing.
jiào
гл. осушить кубок, выпить до дна
长(zhǎng)者举未釂, 少(shào)者不敢饮 младший не смеет пить, пока старший, подняв свою чару, не осушит её
